messages.subject: Re: Question for Mary Ellen [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:Unjobbing
messages.msgSnippet: He developed a product based on an activity he enjoyed.  He then decided to start his own company to manufacture it and has learned how to do a patent search,
messages.messageBody:
He developed a product based on an activity he enjoyed. He then decided
to start his own company to manufacture it and has learned how to do a
patent search, build a web page, write a business plan, marketing,
payroll and taxes, make prototypes, find funding, issue stock, etc., etc.


Mary Ellen

<snip> what kind of unjob does your dh have? <snip>

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: Question for Mary Ellen [Unschooling-dotcom] Re:Unjobbing
messages.msgSnippet: Mary Ellen - if you don t mind, I m just curious - and for the benefit of those of us exploring unjobbing - what kind of unjob does your dh have? Annette
messages.messageBody:
Mary Ellen - if you don't mind, I'm just curious - and for the benefit of those of us exploring unjobbing - what kind of unjob does your dh have?

Annette
<snip> Ironically, he has "unschooled" himself into his current occupation
(which is definitely an Un-job!) Mary Ellen <snip>
